--- select_literals_date.sql
SELECT
  DATE'2014-09-27',
  DATE('2014-09-27'),
  DATE r'2014-09-27',
  TIMESTAMP '2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08',
  TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles",
  TIMESTAMP'2014-09-27',
  TIMESTAMP('2014-09-27'),
  TIMESTAMP r'2014-09-27',
  DATE('2014-09-27') AS FOO,
  TIMESTAMP('2014-09-27') AS BAR

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      310,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  25,
        Expr: &parser.DateLit{
          pos:   9,
          end:   25,
          Value: "2014-09-27",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  29,
        end:  47,
        Expr: &parser.CallExpr{
          end:  47,
          Func: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  29,
            end:  33,
            Name: "DATE",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     parser.ArgList{
            &parser.Arg{
              pos:          34,
              end:          46,
              IntervalUnit: "",
              Expr:         &parser.StringLit{
                pos:   34,
                end:   46,
                Value: "2014-09-27",

          },

          pos:   51,

            &parser.Arg{
              pos:          256,

                pos:   256,
                end:   268,
                Value: "2014-09-27",

        Star: false,
        As:   &parser.Ident{
          pos:  273,
          end:  276,
          Name: "FOO",

      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  280,
        end:  310,
        Expr: &parser.CallExpr{
          end:  303,

            pos:  280,
            end:  289,
            Name: "TIMESTAMP",

          pos:  307,
          end:  310,
          Name: "BAR",

    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT DATE"2014-09-27", DATE("2014-09-27"), DATE"2014-09-27", TIMESTAMP"2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08", TIMESTAMP"2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles", TIMESTAMP"2014-09-27", TIMESTAMP("2014-09-27"), TIMESTAMP"2014-09-27", DATE("2014-09-27") AS FOO, TIMESTAMP("2014-09-27") AS BAR
